item.title: Watchlist: BMNR — Bitmine Immersion Technologies momentum
item.description: Crypto-adjacent microcap seeing rising Stocktwits chatter and volatile bids. Extremely high risk; watch volume and tape.

item.title: Watchlist: BTAI — BioXcel Therapeutics catalyst watch
